fields.description:
The idea to include a REST sync adapter was first tossed in ALOY-110 and closed as *Won't fix* since there already was a community version by [~viezel]:

https://github.com/viezel/napp.alloy.adapter.restapi

However, now we have Arrow and Builder in place, it would be make sense to reconsider and include one in Alloy. It just makes little sense that we promote Alloy-first but the generated Arrow documentation only has classic examples and no instructions to work with models.
fields.summary: Add built-in REST API adapter to use with Arrow
